Description: Mould-made pottery lamp with shoulder-volutes, and a level shoulder with multiple mouldings. The discus is decorated with a band of tongues. Within the narrow base-ring is the impressed name IVNEPV, with the letter I below. Brown-buff clay with mica, covered with a red-brown slip.
Curator's comments: The expansion of the maker's name is uncertain.

Close: L. Benaki Collection, Athens NAM, Inv. No. MΠ 579, signed LVNEI and Inv.
